author: maxb
msg: Bash completion updates. A few extracted from issue 2042, most as a result of
* tools/client-side/bash_completion: Update comments - we want to avoid
mentioning command abbreviations which are purely prefixes of others,
regardless of whether they are unambiguous or not.
here, so expand to the intended text in its one use case.

author: julianfoad
msg: Avoid using SVN_REVNUM_T_FMT, and document why.
(SVN_REVNUM_T_FMT): Document non-use in Subversion source code.

author: julianfoad
msg: Fix the encoding of XML output from "svn list --xml": output it as UTF-8.
(error_checked_fputs): Extracted and made semi-public with svn_cl__ prefix.
(print_header_xml, print_footer_xml): New helper functions, for tidiness.
(print_dirents_xml, svn_cl__ls): Avoid converting UTF-8 to native encoding

author: luebbe
msg: Update German translation on branch. Merged r12856
* branches/1.1.x/subversion/po/de.po: Merged all recent fixes from trunk
